title: One World Trade Center: Rebuilding From Ashes
description: A micro-lesson that makes One World Trade Center: Rebuilding From Ashes usable.

hook.text: After September 11, 2001, rebuilding Ground Zero became the most symbolic real estate project in history.

buildup.text: The site required coordinating government agencies, private developers, families, and security concerns.

discovery.text: One World Trade Center cost $3.9 billion, making it the most expensive office building ever constructed.

quiz.question: Why is One World Trade Center exactly 1,776 feet tall?
